bio: As a first time mum during lockdown, community and networking have become a lifeline for Nina, it has enabled her to discover local gems and meet new friends. Using her background in social media and marketing, her mission is to keep her local community connected using the power of The Delivers platform.
name: Four Heatons Deliver
description: Nestled in between Manchester and Stockport, The Heatons is full of independent businesses and a close-knit community. Our goal at Four Heatons Deliver is to ensure local people discover the variety of businesses on their doorsteps (or contact free collection).
